name: stijl
description: Chrome extension showing all your code reviews in a single page.

scripts.build: npm run lint && rm -f stijl.zip && git clean -fdx extension && npm run build-js && cd extension && zip -r ../stijl.zip .
scripts.build-js: browserify src/index.js -o extension/dashboard.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify src/index.js -v -d -o extension/dashboard.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ]

author: Shuhei Takahashi <takahashi.shuhei@gmail.com>
